pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Saturday, December 12, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks during the Climate Ambition Summit 2020, co-convened by the United Nations, the United Kingdom, and France.

The Summit will be streamed live via the following link: https://www.climateambitionsummit2020.org/
